title: Gaston
description: The delightful service solution for restaurant hospitality.
author: @ApptivaTeam
tagline:
The delightful service solution
for restaurant hospitality.

USP.3: For tablets, website and smart phones

everywhere.title: Menu everywhere
everywhere.content: Present your menu to your customers through a selection of following channels:
everywhere.subcontent1: Hand your customers your menu in form of a tablet, which completely replaces the classic paper menu.
everywhere.subcontent2: Include your menu on your website, so customers can know about your offer before their visit.
everywhere.subcontent3: Put a QR code on your tables through which your customers can view your menu on their own smartphones.
everywhere.subcontent4: Take advantage of Gaston's intuitive menu management to print a classic menu card.

order.title: Order & pay
order.content: Accept orders directly through Gaston! Be it on your website for Take Away & Home Delivery or directly in your restaurant via tablets or smartphones. Gaston can handle the payments as well, no problem.

design.title: Your design
design.content: Your menu should not look like a foreign object in your restaurant. That's why Gaston can create completely customized designs if you don't like any of the standard designs. This goes far beyond simply changing colours and images.

administration.title: Easy menu customization
administration.content: Managing the food & drinks on your menu has never been so convenient! With our intuitive web interface, every change can be made in no time at all.

rental.title: Tablets included
rental.content: The procurement of suitable tablets can be quite expensive at the beginning. Moreover, it is difficult to guess how long the tablets will last before they break. We know our way around menu tablets and therefore offer you the possibility to rent them simply & without any risk from us. Broken tablets are exchanged free of charge. In case of a cancellation you simply return the tablets.

multilingual.title: Multilingual
multilingual.content: Your customers don't always speak your language? No problem! Gaston can display your menu in different languages.

take-away.title: Take Away & Home Delivery
take-away.content: Offer Take Away and Home Delivery on your homepage. Easy to setup and without initial costs.

offers.heading: Offers
offers.subtitle: We have the right offer for every need.

gaston-menu.name: Menu
gaston-menu.text: Present your menu to your customers through following channels:

gaston-order.name: Order
gaston-order.text2: Customers can place orders through selected channels directly via Gaston.

gaston-pay.name: Pay
gaston-pay.text2: Customers can pay orders through selected channels directly via Gaston.

gaston-pro.name: Pro
gaston-pro.text: If none of our basic offers matches your restaurant, we will be happy to make you an offer tailored to your needs.

calculation.howManyTablets: How many tablet licenses do you need?
calculation.whichTablet: Would you like to rent tablets?
calculation.ownTablets: I don't want to rent tablets.

termsAndConditions.title: Services and conditions
termsAndConditions.content:
• Defective devices will be replaced free of charge
  • Free installation of the devices
  • The minimum term is 1 year

rent.title: Tablet rental
rent.description: We do not leave you alone with the choice of your tablets. You can also rent the optimal models for Gaston Menu from us.

android.title: Android tablets for rent
android.description: Our Android tablets offer you the best price-performance ratio. You rent the tablets from us.

iPad.title: Rent iPads
iPad.description: Best quality is close to your heart? Then rent Apple iPads from us.

description.test: Thank you for your interest in Gaston. Please complete the following details so that we can send you the test access.

enrol.customDesign: I'm interested in a custom design.
enrol.YourMessage: Anything else you want to tell us?
enrol.failure: Oops, a mandatory field is not filled out yet.
enrol.thanks: Thank you. We have received your message and will get back to you as soon as possible.
enrol.sorry: Unfortunately this did not work. Sorry for the inconvenience. If you send us an email at support@gastonsolution.com we will contact you immediately.

thanks.title: Thank you
thanks.instructions:
Thank you for your order.

We sent you a confirmation eMail, please also check your spam folder.
We will contact you again as soon as your Gaston account is ready.

about.content: Gaston is a young software start-up that was founded with the vision to revolutionize the ordering and payment process in restaurants, caf√©s and bars. We entered the gastro market with our first product Gaston Menu, but are already full of ideas how to make restaurant visits even more pleasant in the future.

notfound.description: You just hit a route that doesn't exist... the sadness.

cookies.disclaimer: We use cookies to further improve user-friendliness. For this we use anonymous tracking via Google Analytics.
